docs.lead_paragraph: Sterilized milk as a good food for babies deprived of their natural nourishment has been noticed in a previous article. The milk is easily sterilized by boiling it in bottles. The bottles themselves must be kept scrupulously clean, being washed every time they are used with hot water, containing a saltspoonful of washing soda, in each quart bottle.

headline.main: THE BABY'S BATH.; Simple Rules for Healthy Employment of It.
